alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:54PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, southwestern Musselshell, northwestern Yellowstone and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 553 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southwest of Roundup, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shepherd, Broadview and Klein. This advisory does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Southwestern Yellowstone
